editor.label: Application Server - IIS Deploy
editor.description: Deploys an application using MS Deploy.

formElement.label: MS Deploy path:
formElement.documentation: Provide the relative or absolute path to the MSDeploy executable.

formElement.label: Deploy source path:
formElement.documentation: A path to package (application.zip) or to directory which contains the content to be deployed.

formElement.label: Destination website:
formElement.documentation: A name of the web site to be deployed.

formElement.label: Destination application:
formElement.documentation: A name of the application to be deployed. If not provided, the content will be placed under the website.

formElement.label: Application pool name:
formElement.documentation: Application pool name. If the application pool does not exists, it will be created. If this parameter was not specified, the application will be placed into the default pool, which has the same name as website.
